install.name: Breadcrumbs Advanced
install.author: UWiX
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2005 - 2008 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: This module displays the breadcrumbs but has more advanced options than the original module from Joomla! 1.5.

param.name: cutLast
param.label: Cut off last breadcrumb
param.description: Cut off last breadcrumb at x characters

param.name: cutAt
param.label: Cut breadcrumb at
param.description: Give the position where to cut off the last breadcrumb

param.name: cutChar
param.label: Add character(s) at cut off end
param.description: Give the character(s) to place at the end of the cut off breadcrumb

param.name: startLevel
param.label: Start level
param.description: Menu level to start showing breadcrumbs

param.default: Remember to unpublish the default breadcrumbs module, otherwise you'll have 2 breadcrumb-lines!
param.label: Note:

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
